item.title: Live Updates: F.D.A. Plans to Announce Emergency Use of Coronavirus Drug
item.description: The experimental drug, remdesivir, still needs more review, but Dr. Fauci calls early results “very optimistic.” President Trump is pressing a crash vaccine program, but experts fear risks of rushing.

item.title: Hasidic Funeral in Brooklyn Draws 2,500, Creating Crisis for Mayor de Blasio
item.description: The event showed the challenges that officials have faced in addressing the flouting of social distancing in close-knit ultra-Orthodox neighborhoods.
item.dc:creator: Liam Stack
item.media:description: Hundreds gathered on the streets of Williamsburg Tuesday for the funeral of a rabbi who reportedly died of Covid-19.
